bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names chan ru yu ji 產乳余 疾 , zi ru yu ji 字乳余疾. Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all types of diseases related to post-partum blood stagnation, qi and blood depletion weakness, as well as breast-feeding. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry sang shang ji sheng 桑上寄生：內傷不足，產後余疾，下乳汁 , “[It cures] internal harmand insufficiency, as well as ailments following delivery . It stimulates breast milk discharge”.
